<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script_client"><sys_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>NeedIt onChange Example2</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
   if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   alert("You have changed the Short description from " + oldValue + " to " + newValue + ".");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ramon.botelho</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-07 19:59:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e171319cdb3350106b577b82399619c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedIt onChange Example2</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_client_e171319cdb3350106b577b82399619c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ramon.botelho</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-07 20:09:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type/><ui_type>0</ui_type><view/></sys_script_client></record_update>
